name: Promote My Extensions
author: GrandSlambert

sections.description:
This plugin creates a custom post type to share information about WordPress themes and plugins you’ve developed.

Extra Details

  • Allows you to create sub pages and indicate which ones has the plugin documentation.
  • Provide a URL for where a person can download the plugin.
  • Add a quick link to some Frequently Asked Questions.
  • Add a quick link to the support forums.
  • Add a quick link to the plugin reviews.
  • Add a link to a donate button to allow people to donate to your plugin.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin actually do?

It creates custom post type allowing you to share information about your WordPress themes and plugins.
sections.changelog:
0.4.0 – December 10th, 2022

  • Added option to indicate if extension is a theme or a plugin (default).
  • Removed the PayPal logo for those not using PayPal for donations.
  • Added feature to allow you to select the display order of the Post Type Arvhives pages.

0.3.0 – December 9th, 2022

  • Added options to determine which details fields, if any, you will be using.
  • Renamed the post type and category types to be unique to the plugin.
  • Added code to update from older versions – may require you to reactiveate the plugin.
  • Added categories for documentation.

0.2.1 – December 8th, 2022

  • Fixed an issue where options were not created on activation.

0.2.0 – December 8th, 2022

  • Added option to allow you to set the menu name and index slug for your plugins.
  • Added options to allow you to select what your custom post type supports.
  • Added options to allow you to turn off the categories and documenation post type.

0.1.0 – December 6th, 2022

  • Initial release

short_description: This plugin creates a custom post type to share information about WordPress themes and plugins you've developed.

upgrade_notice.0.3.0: • If you do not see your information after updating, reactive the plugin.
upgrade_notice.0.2.1: • It is advised to reactivate the plugin after updating.
